items.title: Breadcrumb
items.description: A set of links that can help a user understand and navigate a website hierarchy.

lastReviewed.title: Last Reviewed
lastReviewed.description: Date on which the content on this web page was last reviewed for accuracy and/or completeness.

items.title: Reviewed by
items.description: People or organizations that have reviewed the content on this web page for accuracy and/or completeness.

items.title: Accessibility API
items.description: Indicates that the resource is compatible with the referenced accessibility API (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).

items.title: Accessibility Control
items.description: Identifies input methods that are sufficient to fully control the described resource (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).

items.title: Accessibility Feature
items.description: Content features of the resource, such as accessible media, alternatives and supported enhancements for accessibility (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values).

items.title: Accessibility Hazard
items.description: A characteristic of the described resource that is physiologically dangerous to some users. Related to WCAG 2.0 guideline 2.3. (WebSchemas wiki lists possible values)

items.title: Alternative Headline
items.description: A secondary title of the CreativeWork.

author.title: Author
author.description: The author of this content. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangeably.

items.title: Award
items.description: An award won by this person or for this creative work.

items.title: Citation
items.description: A citation or reference to another creative work, such as another publication, web page, scholarly article, etc.

items.title: Content Rating
items.description: Official rating of a piece of content—for example,'MPAA PG-13'.

items.title: Contributor
items.description: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork.

copyrightHolder.title: Copyright Holder
copyrightHolder.description: The party holding the legal copyright to the CreativeWork.

copyrightYear.title: Copyright Year
copyrightYear.description: The year during which the claimed copyright for the CreativeWork was first asserted.

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: The creator/author of this CreativeWork or UserComments. This is the same as the Author property for CreativeWork.

dateCreated.title: Date Created
dateCreated.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created.

dateModified.title: Date Modified
dateModified.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified.

educationalUse.title: Educational Use
educationalUse.description: The purpose of a work in the context of education; for example, 'assignment', 'group work'.

inLanguage.title: In Language
inLanguage.description: The language of the content. please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard.

items.title: Interaction Count
items.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this item—for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

interactivityType.title: Interactivity Type
interactivityType.description: The predominant mode of learning supported by the learning resource. Acceptable values are 'active', 'expositive', or 'mixed'.

isFamilyFriendly.title: Is Family Friendly
isFamilyFriendly.description: Indicates whether this content is family friendly.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: The keywords/tags used to describe this content.

learningResourceType.title: Learning Resource Type
learningResourceType.description: The predominant type or kind characterizing the learning resource. For example, 'presentation', 'handout'.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: The organization or agency that is providing the service.

text.title: Text
text.description: The textual content of this CreativeWork.

typicalAgeRange.title: Typical Age Range
typicalAgeRange.description: The typical expected age range, e.g. '7-9', '11-'.

version.title: Version
version.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.

items.title: Description
items.description: A short description of the item.
